content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mining Operation at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill (position x=43.0, y=-82.0) 
- Furnace (position x=41.0, y=-82.0)
- Burner Inserter (position x=43.5, y=-80.5) that moves items between chests
- Chests at positions (x=42.5, y=-83.5), (x=44.5, y=-81.5), (x=43.5, y=-79.5), and (x=45.5, y=-80.5) to store coal and other items

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting from a chest with no items
- Ensure the chest has items to extract before attempting extraction
### Errors when a chest at the drop position is full
- Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining
### Errors when a burner mining drill is out of fuel
- Insert coal into the drill to continue operation
### Errors when an inserter is waiting for source items
- Ensure the inserter has source items to pick up before attempting to move items
